product_description: Bring color and creativity to every project with Lova Multicolor Chenille Stems. This 200-count pack gives you plenty of flexible, fuzzy pipe cleaners you can bend, twist, and shape into almost anything—perfect for classrooms, craft nights, party activities, and DIY decorating. Each stem features a bendable wire core and a soft chenille exterior, so your creations can hold their form while staying comfortable to work with. Use them for flowers, animals, ornaments, wreath accents, gift wrapping, and more. Beyond crafts, these stems are also useful for light cleaning in narrow openings (like reusable straws and similar hard-to-reach gaps). Keep a pack in your craft bin, classroom cabinet, or utility drawer and you’ll always have a quick, flexible solution ready.
